alert.note: Alert for Bossier; Webster (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 7:20PM CDT until June 17 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Webster Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Northeastern Bossier Parish in northwestern Louisiana... * Until 815 PM CDT. * At 719 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Plain Dealing moving north northeast near 20 mph. Another severe thunderstorm was located just 5 miles southwest of Cotton Valley, moving northeast near 20 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Springhill, Cullen, Cotton Valley, Sarepta, Shongaloo, Leton and Couchwood. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
